entries.title: Taskbar clock display seconds
entries.description: Changes the clock on the taskbar to show the current time with increased precision by including seconds.

entries.title: Remove Cortana from the taskbar
entries.description: This will not only remove the Cortana icon from the taskbar but also hide the option to toggle the Cortana icon from the context menu by right-clicking the taskbar.
